description: The Schiessbecher is a grenade launcher designed for the Kar98K. Diffrent from most launchers in that it is inslated in the end of the barrel and secured by a clamp. The grenade is launched by shooting a blank wooden bullet into the bottom of the grenade and this primes and launches the explosive. While tradionaly made to shot one grenade and then reload, this one has been modified to shoot five before needing to reload.
